apihelp-query+wikiconfig-paramvalue-prop: Check if the wiki is marked as closed
View which extensions are enabled on the wiki
Check if the wiki is marked as inactive
View the permissions of the user groups
Check if the wiki is marked as private
View the settings of the wiki
View the sitename of the wiki
apiwarn-wikiconfig-nopermission: You are not allowed to view the configuration for wiki '$1'.
log-description-managewiki: This log tracks all changes to a wikis settings through ManageWiki.
logentry-managewiki-rights: $1 changed group metadata for $3: add rights $4; removed rights $5; added addgroups $6; removed addgroups $7; added removegroups $8; removed removegroups $9
managewiki-desc: Allows people to manage wikis through a web interface
managewiki-disabled: This feature ($1) has not been enabled on this wiki yet.
managewiki-header: Select what you would like to manage below, and click submit!
managewiki-extensions-header:
The extensions here are the ones that are currently installed, but you can always [https://meta.miraheze.org/wiki/Request_features request] another one to be added.
To manage the settings for this wiki please see [[Special:ManageWiki|this page]].
Once you are done, press the "submit" tab to save your changes.
managewiki-settings-header:
This page is used to manage the wiki settings of wiki '$1'. If a feature you would like is not available here yet, please use [https://meta.miraheze.org/wiki/Request_features Phabricator] to request it.
To manage the extensions for this wiki please see [[Special:ManageWikiExtensions|this page]] instead.
Once you are done, press the "submit" tab to save your changes.
managewiki-mwlocked: This wiki has it's ability to use ManageWiki restricted.
managewiki-namespace-conflicts: Cannot modify "$1", a namespace with that name already exists
managewiki-ns-createnamespaceinfo: Press the button below to create a new namespace on this wiki. You will be able to define a name and configure it on the next page.
managewiki-ns-header: Select a namespace to edit below (if you want to edit a talk namespace, select it's associated main namespace) or press the button to create a new namespace below!
managewiki-ns-invalidid: Namespace IDs must be an even integer to edit through ManageWiki.
managewiki-ns-select: Select a namespace from the list below and press submit
managewiki-perm-header: Select a group below that already exists to modify or create a new user group in the box below it!
managewiki-perm-nonexistent: The group "$1" does not currently exist.
managewiki-perm-not-default: This is not the central wiki therefore editing the default user groups is not authorised.
managewiki-perm-rename-blacklisted: Unable to rename as the group you are trying to rename has been blacklisted.
managewiki-perm-rename-taken: Unable to rename as "$1" already exists.
managewiki-perm-resetgroups-header: By clicking the button below, all group configuration will be wiped and the default permissions configuration for the wiki will be restored. This will remove all custom changes except the readability of the wiki. Proceed only if you are sure you wish to do this.
managewiki-perm-success-text: "$1" metadata has been saved and should be applied within the next minute.
managewiki-success: The settings have been successfully changed.
namespaces-aliases: Enter on a new line all undefined namespaces which should redirect to this one
namespaces-content: Does this namespace contain main wiki material (content)?
namespaces-delete-checkbox: Checking this box will cause this namespace to be deleted
namespaces-migrate-to: If this namespace is deleted, what namespace should the pages be moved to?
namespaces-protection: Which userright should be needed to edit this namespace?
namespaces-search: Should this namespace be searchable by default?
namespaces-subpages: Should this namespace have subpages enabled?
